July 23, 1997

Mr. James J. Morgan
President

Philip Morris U.S.A.
120 Park Avenue
New York, NY 10017

Attention: Maureen,
Dear Maureen:

Just a note to confirm CTR's budget meeting at your offices
with Mr. Morgan & Ms. Keane on Wednesday, October 15, 11:00 AM.
Attending ftom CTR will be Dr. James P. Glenn, Chairman and Dr.
Harmon C. McAllister, Scientific Director,

Thanks for your help,

Sincerely,

L

 

Torraine Pollice
Treasurer

summary: ‘Tue Councit For Tonacco RESHARCH-U.S.A., INC. (CTR)’ will hold a budget meeting at your offices on Wednesday, October 15, 11:00 AM. The meeting will be held at 120 Park Avenue in New York City.
